title: WTB: N172 Old Judge 1886 StL Browns Champions
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge 1886 StL Browns Champions
posts.post_content:
Hi. I would like to add a type card to my collection if monetarily possible. My collection is SGC graded and would like to keep it as such. I would be interested in a 1886 St. Louis Browns Champions card. No holes or creases, trimmed ok, back damage ok. Just a nice clear image in reasonable condition (Authentic-SGC 30?). Let me know what you have. Send scans/prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!

I have this one available.  Shoot me an e-mail if interested.
JimB
[URL=http://img208.imageshack.us/i/n172comiskeysgc20front.jpg/][IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/9086/n172comiskeysgc20front.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
][URL=http://img99.imageshack.us/i/n172comiskeysgc20back.jpg/][IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/6491/n172comiskeysgc20back.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Tony-Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. I have most available (in various condition).

Best--Jay
